ExperienceSummary.ExecutiveBrief: Santosh Kumar S. has been working in the IT occupational sector for more than 7 years. Currently he is employed as an Unix Administrator. Santosh Kumar has extensive knowledge of Linux, Linux Red Hat, AIX UNIX, Sun Solaris, Oracle, Network File System, VMware, Apache WEB Server, UNIX, HP-UX, Veritas Volume Manager, Veritas NetBackup, Perl Programming, Jakarta TOMCAT Servlet Engine, Domain Name Server Protocol, Oracle Applications, Microsoft Access, Dell Server Hardware, WebLogic Enterprise Application Server, SAN, MySQL, Veritas Cluster, Retail Performance Manager, RDBMS, Oracle PL/SQL, Oracle 11g, Oracle 10G, Network Appliance, Linux Suse, Linux Fedora, Jboss, IBM WebSphere, HP Hardware, BIND, shell scripting, TCP/IP, Samba, SUN Hardware > Sun Enterprise Servers, SQL, SMTP, PC Hardware, Oracle 9i, Netscape iPlanet Enterprise Application Server, Microsoft SQL Server 7.0, Microsoft Exchange 2003, LAN/WAN > WAN, LAN/WAN > LAN, Java, IBM HTTP Server, Hitachi Hardware, HTTP, HP Server Hardware, FTP, EMC Symmetrix, Dynamic Host Control protocol, Data Migration, Client/Server, XEN, Web Hosting, UML/OMT, SUN Hardware > Sun SPARC series, SUN Hardware > Sun Blade series, SAS Statistical Package, Ruby, Redhat Linux OS, PowerEdge Hardware, PostgreSQL, POP, Oracle Real Application Clusters, Oracle Installation, Oracle Data Guard, Oracle 8i, OEL 5.5, Microsoft Visual C/C++, Microsoft SQL Server 2000, Microsoft Internet Information Server, Microsoft Exchange 2000, Korn Shell, Java 2 Enterprise Edition, JScript, Informatica, IMAP, IBM Hardware > IBM xSeries, IBM Hardware > IBM pSeries, IBM Hardware > IBM Blade Server, IBM Hardware, HP Proliant, HP OpenView Servers, HP Network Node Manager, Data Centre, CENTOS, BMC Software, Ant. So far Santosh Kumar has not gained any managerial experience.
